description: Details of the Urban Greening Factor in pursuant to condition 14 of planning application ref:194996FUL dated 01.10.2020 for: Construction of 149 residential units (54 x 1 bed, 79 x 2 bed, 13 x 3 bed and 3 x 4 bed) ranging in height between one and four-storeys, with associated hardstanding, car parking, landscaping and boundary treatment works.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details of the urban greening factor measures in pursuant to condition 14 of planning application Ref: 194996FUL dated 2.10.2020 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies G5 of the London Plan, policy 5.10 of Ealing's Development Management DPD.
